subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner defeated Arnaud Clément, 6-3, 5-7, 7-6 (2), on Saturday in Auckland, New Zealand, to win the Heineken Open for his first ATP World Tour singles title.
snippet: John Isner defeated Arnaud Clément, 6-3, 5-7, 7-6 (2), on Saturday in Auckland, New Zealand, to win the Heineken Open for his first ATP World Tour singles title.
